          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Feste nazionali</string>
            <string language="en">National Holidays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nationale Feiertage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vacances Nationales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Feriados Nacionais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθνικές διακοπές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Días de fiesta Nacionales</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Gli studenti possono imparare riguardo alle feste nazionali e fare degli esercizi</string>
            <string language="en">Students can learn about national holidays in Europe and can carry out exercises.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">feste nazionali</string>
            <string language="en">national holidays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">inni nazionali</string>
            <string language="en">national anthems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">simboli nazionali</string>
            <string language="en">national symbols</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer können über nationale Feiertage 
in Europa erlernen und können Übungen durchführen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants peuvent se renseigner sur des 
vacances nationales en Europe et peuvent effectuer des exercices.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes podem aprender sobre feriados 
nacionais em Europa e podem realizar exercícios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να μάθουν για τις εθνικές 
διακοπές στην Ευρώπη και μπορούν να πραγματοποιήσουν τις 
ασκήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes pueden aprender sobre días de 
fiesta nacionales en Europa y pueden realizar ejercicios.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
